snippet: Because of limits on where such offenders can live, the measure is effective for a community, but may be counterproductive to public safety over all.
abstract: Communities nationwide are building small pocket parks to drive out sex offenders, because of limits on where such offenders can live; parks, however, will probably leave more offenders homeless, with research showing that once they lose stable housing they become more likely to commit another crime.
lead_paragraph: Because of limits on where such offenders can live, the measure is effective for a community, but may be counterproductive to public safety over all.

headline.seo: Building Tiny Parks to Drive Sex Offenders Away
headline.main: Neighborhoods Seek to Banish Sex Offenders by Building Parks
headline.print_headline: Neighborhoods Seek to Banish Sex Offenders by Building Parks
